Package fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.model.card

Enum Class DistrictCard

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<DistrictCard>
fr.cotedazur.univ.polytech.model.card.DistrictCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<DistrictCard>, Constable
public enum DistrictCard extends Enum<DistrictCard>
This enum represents the different district cards in the game.
